chapters.title: Prologue: Lightnings
chapters.info: Sevanna, p. 27 (20)—Wise One of the Jumai sept of the Shaido Aiel. She is the widow of the last two chiefs of the Shaido, Suladric and Couladin. She has green eyes. She knows that the easiest way to power for herself is to attach herself to men who already hold power; her newest plan is to marry Rand al'Thor, the Car'a'carn against his will by using a binder that Caddar gave her. See also Caddar; Couladin; Desaine; Muradin; Suladric; Therava.
